CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 27, 1962, pg. 1 reads:" Three Years Old! - Little Richard Spann (seated, third from left), was 3 years old recently, and "lived it up" as an "adult tot" when his mother, Mrs. Joyce Spann, held a birthday-dinner party for him. Shown are, left to right, seated: Anthony Bailey, Gina Jenkins, Richard, the honoree, and Tina Ann Jackson.  Standing: Janis Jackson, Michael Bailey and Rodriquez Bailey. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of birthday party-goers, from left, seated: Anthony Bailey, Gina Jenkins, Richard Spann, the honoree, and Tina Ann Jackson; standing: Janis Jackson, Michael Bailey, and Rodriquez Bailey, wearing party hats, posed behind two tiered birthday cake decorated with cowboys, in Spann home
